resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
SIGN UP FOR AN ACCOUNT AND START INVESTING

We are the Zest! The Drive that spark the Financial Giant in you. But beyond that, we are made up of Vibrant and Engaging Minds, Thriving to create a Passionate Community where Financial Education becomes the NEW NORMAL For Ghana\'s Economic Good and For a Better Tomorrow.

ZestSed Ghana is a Financial Mindshift organization on a journey to Empower Young People through Financial Education, while providing Hands-On experience. Its a 2-in-1 Fintech Community, made up of the Wealth Creators & the Financial Education Community. More than just a common ground for those interested in upping their Financial Literacy, ZestSed offers unrivaled Networking and Investing opportunities.

For us, the social impact is key in building a financial community, where members engage in regular constructive Knowledge Sharing Sessions (KSS) on Personal Finance, Entrepreneurship, Money Matters, Financial Technologies and inspired to share same with their peers via the SnowBall effect. We believe the Change we seek is Doable one person at a time.

VISION

We aim at Creating a Platform that Financially Empowers Young Ghanaian minds.

MISSION

  • Aspires to raise Financially Responsible Young Adults to Manage their Personal Finances and impact the Economy at all levels.
  • Engage young people in various Financial Education Projects both as Learners, Trainers or Mentors.
  • Harness the growing Fintech opportunities and keep young people abreast with current disruptive technologies for growth.
The Zest Side of Life, it\'s all about Financial Empowerment, Learning By Doing, Thinking-Long-Term whiles leveraging the agile Technological opportunities for both personal and economic growth. We are on a quest to Commitedly raise the level of Financial Literacy among Young Ghanaians. Empowering our younger generation to be Financially Savvy is a gift; a Life Long Experience that will aid Informed Decision Making, Job Creation and Increment in Ghana\'s GDP.

WHY US

The SPINE effect

Members of our noble communities are privileged to enjoy our Well-Thought-Out SPINE effects, a lasting experience that grows with them.

S- SECURITY is an integral element of our environment that provides the peace of mind to nurture the investor in you with zest, and the assurance that quotas are entrusted in the cares of reputable and trustworthy financial brands. Members gain confidence since they are empowered to psychologically, emotionally and most importantly financially prepare, for a stress-free future.

P- PRIORITY informs our decision to gain financial knowledge to secure the future. Our communities therefore inspire a proactive culture of managing your personal financial lifestyle. We are more concerned about how you consciously develop the habit of ‘Invest Before you Spend’ to \'Buy Interest\'; eliminating the "Hand-To-Mouth" lifestyle. Financial freedom requires discipline and we at ZESTSED help each other make it a PRIORITY, to consciously channel our financial resources into productive use.

I- INVESTING is the NEW BOLD. A step your future self will thank you for. Depending solely on your pension benefits for retirement won\'t be enough. Unless your company offers a sizable pension plan, you will probably need to start spending prudently to invest early. ZESTSED makes it easier for you to understand the need to Invest early: by instilling The Learning By Doing attitude. Because we know that your invested income can cater for your living expense, supplement other activities for a comfortable Retirement or towards achieving your goals.

N- NETWORKING is core to us because it exposes our communities to a vast pool of knowledge from professionals, students and entrepreneurs across different industries, allowing them to increase their contacts for growth. Our members reach out to industry experts as well as the broader finance and investment world through our annual networking seminars, and summits organized. At the Zest Side of Life we strongly believe that ‘Your Network Today Will Grow your Networth Tomorrow’.

E- EMPOWERMENT at the Zest Side of life is a priceless boost and knowledge gained that increases your financial intelligence. Our communities are a blend of smart brains across diverse backgrounds with different work profiles and exposures. It therefore offers each member an opportunity to learn and benefit from the wealth of experience via our weekly Knowledge Sharing Sessions (KSS). An experience that challenges your way of thinking and keeps you informed.

☺ Congrats Wealth Creator! You\'ve Got Your Financial SPINE Covered 👍
